top_stories.title: Conveyor uses AI to automate the painful process of vendor security reviews and RFPs with AI
top_stories.description: The 4-year-old startup nabbed a $20 million Series B from SignalFire.
top_stories.author: Marina Temkin

top_stories.title: Turn RTX ON With 40% Off Performance Day Passes
top_stories.description:
Level up GeForce NOW experiences this summer with 40% off Performance Day Passes. Enjoy 24 hours of premium cloud gaming with RTX ON, delivering low latency and shorter wait times. The hot deal comes just in time for the cloud’s highly anticipated launch of Dune: Awakening — a multiplayer survival game on a massive scale	
		Read Article
top_stories.author: GeForce NOW Community

top_stories.title: NVIDIA TensorRT Boosts Stable Diffusion 3.5 Performance on NVIDIA GeForce RTX and RTX PRO GPUs
top_stories.description:
Generative AI has reshaped how people create, imagine and interact with digital content. As AI models continue to grow in capability and complexity, they require more VRAM, or video random access memory. The base Stable Diffusion 3.5 Large model, for example, uses over 18GB of VRAM — limiting the number of systems that can run	
		Read Article
top_stories.author: Gerardo Delgado

top_stories.title: How Warp is introducing robots to automate its network of warehouses
top_stories.description: Warp can't automate long-haul trucking or short-range delivery, so it's working on what it can potentially change: the workflows inside its warehouses.
top_stories.author: Rebecca Szkutak

top_stories.title: Meta sues AI ‘nudify’ app Crush AI for advertising on its platforms
top_stories.description: Meta has sued the maker of a popular AI "nudify" app, Crush AI, that reportedly ran thousands of ads across its platforms.
top_stories.author: Maxwell Zeff
